question: The complex compounds <katex>$[Co(NH_{3})_{5}SO_{4}]Br$</katex> and <katex>$[Co(NH_{3})_{5}Br]SO_{4}$</katex> are: [cite: 185]
explanation: These isomers give different ions in solution (<katex>$Br^-$</katex> vs <katex>$SO_4^{2-}$</katex>), which characterizes ionisation isomerism. [cite: 189, 190]
